ppy/osu-wiki.summary: Recent activities include updates to the Midnight Moment Art Contest news post, specifically the entry count, as well as various translation and article updates, such as the expansion of Difficulty Reduction mod articles and the retranslation of Help centre/Account restrictions.

ppy/osu.summary: Recent activities focus on improvements to the osu!taiko game mode, including the addition of pooling for HitRim and HitCentre classes, and enhancements to the beatmap editing flow with the introduction of an audio tab for easier sample and volume management.

ppy/s3-nginx-proxy.summary: Recent activities include a pull request to preserve upstream Cache-Control headers, ensuring better caching and performance in the proxy server.
